documents.document: @bbcnickrobinson @FT Oh my gourd! What's the three penny opera worth now at current exchange rates?
No @theresa_may you do not have the support of 65 million. #minus1 #notinmyname

@ruskin147 Thanks in part to unleaded petrol...
@mike_allison78 @WeeScottishMamm @Stoviesplz @SteveReedMP If legislature won't hold executive to account need to look to the judiciary.
@mike_allison78 @WeeScottishMamm @Stoviesplz @SteveReedMP Don't trust any of them. Direct action the way forward.
@UKIPNFKN @HuffPostUKPol @HuffPostUK So it wasn't the ferrets down his trousers causing him to shuffle around in that shifty manner?
@SteveReedMP That's it. I give up on the lot of you. https://t.co/t9bp9Ky2ni
@mja2705 @NickCohen4 Chlorinated chicken and fries.
@faisalislam Having recently had to choose between a crook and a fascist you've got to hope the French won't make the same mistake again.
@bbcnickrobinson A reminder that a petition is proactive whereas a poll is reactive and with a much smaller sample size.
The mute button in Twitter gives politicians the chance to do explicitly what they have been doing implicitly to the electorate for years.
@mtpennycook The only way to lance this boil is to hold an election. If not it will fester for decades and what you fear become more likely.
@mtpennycook No, I am suggesting you reflect upon your actions. What is at stake is the loss of an entire generation to mainstream politics.
@mtpennycook Every time you press the mute button think about each party member cutting up their membership card.
@CarolineLucas That wheezing noise is the sound of an entire generation losing faith in the mainstream democratic process.
@shanselman Checks and balances, checks and balances; go together like kings and palaces...
@Peston Randy Newman song 'Political science' seems to be coming true.
@Peston @BorisJohnson In every tyrants heart there springs in the end, the poison that he cannot trust a friend - Aeschylus
@ChukaUmunna If you believe the Â£350m exists you are a fool. If you don't believe it you are just playing games. Knave or fool - you decide.
@faisalislam @BorisJohnson And Trump policy is not "divisive and wrong". A decent opposition would make mincemeat of him.
@faisalislam @andikynast At this point I just want to say "I am a doughnut" - or something like that.
@SteveReedMP One million people sign a petition. With no sense of irony Downing Street rejects it as a "populist gesture". Where now?
@bbcnickrobinson @BBCr4today Yes. That's why I retune every time you give airtime to the likes of Gove Farage IDS Howard etc.
@ChukaUmunna You are just giving credence to lies and nonsense. Vote against Article 50. No support from this resident of SW16.
@BorisJohnson EU nationals have right to seek assistance from U.K. representation in locations where they have none of their own.
@SteveReedMP Telling people they are voting in an advisory referendum then insisting it provides a mandate is an act of fraud.
@SteveReedMP Signed. I hope that you will not be participating in any events associated with the proposed state visit.
@bbclaurak @BBCNews In every tyrants heart there springs in the end, the poison that he cannot trust a friend - Aeschylus
@UKIPNFKN @Independent Just foreigners? What about the rest of us?
Thanks @TulipSiddiq for having principles when all around you are losing theirs. @SteveReedMP
@bbclaurak As someone who travelled in the Soviet Union in the early 1980s I admire your bravery in tweeting this while still there.
@SteveReedMP @hariashurst Without an election this thing will be a festering sore poisoning British society for decades to come.
@SteveReedMP What is the point of being a member of a party that is too scared to effectively oppose and too scared to fight an election?
@SteveReedMP How many members does the party expect to lose as a result of this capitulation?
@ruskin147 You're eating Bambi?
@SteveReedMP Ever get the feeling you've been cheated? https://t.co/mpiBTXocU2
@bbcweather Has no one realised yet that this should be called snizzle?
The @SNP should assign an English region to each of their Westminster MPs to represent the views of those of us abandoned by our own MPs.
@SteveReedMP @SNP So we now have the situation where residents of Croydon must look to MPs in Scotland to represent their interests.
@BBCr4today The Today programme has truly become a parade of has-beens and know nothings. Scraping the bottom of the barrel this morning.
@philnealfanclub @pestononsunday @michaelgove No, but the rest of us switch off if his appearance is mentioned in the running order.
@paul__johnson @InsideCroydon Surely there is a commons committee that can ask her this question where she can't avoid answering.
@charlesarthur @womensmarchlon Yum with lettuce and tartare sauce, a completely balanced diet.
@UKIPNFKN @guardian At what point does his abject failure to do his job as an MEP become so obvious that he has to resign?
@SkyNews Why would it take him as long as 90 days to sign whatever Trump wanted. Obsequious lickspittle.
@UKIPNFKN @thehill Does he know that it is a French song?
@UKIPNFKN @Nigel_Farage @guardian Now he is the patron saint of lost dignity.
@Peston @theresa_may @realDonaldTrump The beginning of a new golden age in a very special relationship.
Confirmed - Nigel Farage stepped down as UKIP leader to spend more time with his ego.
@faisalislam @woodyjohnson4 Take him to a five day test match. That should sort him out.
@UKIPNFKN @Independent How many three line whips has he ignored during his long career? A mark of his integrity.
@UKIPNFKN @guardian Replaced by the great British fruitcake plan.
@SteveReedMP How many times has Jeremy Corbyn voted against a the line whip in his long political career? Mark of integrity, no?
@UKIPNFKN @BIUK @clusterstock Dead cat bounce.
@SteveReedMP No one voted for this. Goes against Tory manifesto pledge. Fully justified if you decide to oppose. https://t.co/OOCuyjR4r3

@CourtNewsUK If found guilty will he face transportation to Van Diemens Land?

@bbclaurak Butt tweet
@julielerman @korchev I remember when MS Word went from version 2 to 6. Just marketing.

@charlesarthur Presumably if it had appeared on the front page of the Daily Star it would have been OK?

@faisalislam By December first Richmond had fell, It was a time I remember oh so well. The night they drove Zac Goldsmith down.
@DexEUgov @DavidDavisMP @AlunCairns @ElephantandBun Well Minister whether you have cake or eat cake you have to pay for cake. Really?
@charlesarthur Oasis are releasing a new album?
@jemimakiss @jeffjarvis There's an actual product called Smorz?
@shanselman What about the correlation between people who disagree with everybody and their ability to use y'all?
@ruskin147 Bargains that you would be Knuts to ignore.
@faisalislam They could have sat down on June 24th and come up with that. Shows how little progress has been made in five months.
@Peston Political Science - Randy Newman (though more Trump than Brexit)
@Peston Idiot Wind - Dylan
@Disinfo1982 @SteveReedMP @guardian Yes its the speciousness of the original argument I am trying to point out. Thanks for helping me along.
@Disinfo1982 @SteveReedMP @guardian Obviously not - having two classes of citizens when it comes to health care is a much bigger issue.
@SteveReedMP @Disinfo1982 @guardian Paying to skip queues in hospital = good. Paying to skip queues at border = bad. #Brexit logic.
@SteveReedMP @Disinfo1982 @guardian And Tories are very pro-choice (when it suits them).
@Disinfo1982 @SteveReedMP @guardian I know. His argument is irrelevant. If it is open to everyone can't be higher, no?
@Disinfo1982 @SteveReedMP @guardian Argument is irrelevant as long as it is open to everyone. Leavers can chose to lose their EU citizenship
@faisalislam @JellyWobbleBott If it was part of Schengen Agreement would it require treaty change?
@SteveReedMP @guardian Given the choice between paying an annual fee for this or for multiple visas to go on holiday it is a no brainer.
@DexEUgov @WalkerWorcester This is the sort of meaningless running commentary that even John Motson would have been embarrassed by.
@DexEUgov @WalkerWorcester Have you invested in special software to generate these meaningless platitudes?

@Gizmodo I don't mind chopping wood and I don't care that my capsules no good.

@moira_o_donnell @CrapViews The bench of schadenfreude.
